desc: A complex web application built using Python, Django, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, JS and PostgreSQL for Db connection. This web app allows the management of student records and proctoring related components of the college record management of students.

A web application built using Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, PHP, MySQL and Apache Server. This web app depicts the management of documents digitally, documents are stored in database. Similar systems are being used by many apps and companies of which some are GPay and Digilocker.
An android app built using Java and XML on Android Studio to perform basic operations of storing, retrieving nad updating the notes using Room Database for storage.

A simple android application built using Java and XML. Not a working model... just UI.
A simple ThreeJS practice project built using ThreeJS, HTML5 and CSS3. Includes concepts of canvas, geometry formation, altering properties and orbitcontrols in ThreeJS.
A simple ThreeJS practice project built using ThreeJS, HTML5 and CSS3. Includes concepts of canvas, geometry formation, altering properties, orbitcontrols, animations and custom material in ThreeJS.

A simple web application built using HTML5, Bootstrap,CSS3, PHP, MySQL, Apache Server and Google's OAuth2 api for login. This web app is a simpler version of currently available Google Classroom, that allows the creation and management of a virual classroom.
My first flutter application built using Flutter and Dart. Fetches the time for different timezones using 'World Time API' and displays it on the screen. Allows user to select timezone.
